info.name: Task Manager API - Complete Test Suite
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for Task Manager API testing.

## API Overview
A RESTful API for managing tasks with user authentication.

## Authentication
This API uses JWT (JSON Web Token) Bearer authentication.
1. Register a new user account using `/api/v1/auth/register`
2. Login with your credentials using `/api/v1/auth/login` to obtain a JWT token
3. Include the token in the `Authorization` header as `Bearer <token>` for all protected requests

JWT tokens expire after 24 hours from issuance.

## Test Coverage
- Health Check Tests: 4 test cases
- Registration Tests: 22 test cases
- Login Tests: 15 test cases
- Task CRUD Tests: 94 test cases
- E2E Workflow Tests: 2 test cases
